remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载来通过指定其文件名启动一个进程资源。Use this overload to start a process resource by specifying its file name. 该重载将资源与新对象。The overload associates the resource with a new object. > [!NOTE] > 如果要启动的可执行文件的地址是 URL，则不会启动进程和`null`返回。If the address of the executable file to start is a URL, the process is not started and `null` is returned. 此重载使你无需首先创建一个新启动的进程实例。This overload lets you start a process without first creating a new instance. 该重载是创建一个新的显式步骤的替代方法实例，设置的成员属性，再调用为实例。The overload is an alternative to the explicit steps of creating a new instance, setting the member of the property, and calling for the instance. 您可以通过设置启动 ClickOnce 应用程序`fileName`最初从中安装应用程序的位置 （例如，Web 地址） 的参数。You can start a ClickOnce application by setting the `fileName` parameter to the location (for example, a Web address) from which you originally installed the application. 不通过指定其安装的位置在硬盘驱动器上启动 ClickOnce 应用程序。Do not start a ClickOnce application by specifying its installed location on your hard drive. 通过指定其文件名称中启动进程是类似于键入中的信息`Run`对话框中的 windows`Start`菜单。Starting a process by specifying its file name is similar to typing the information in the `Run` dialog box of the Windows `Start` menu. 因此，文件名称不必表示一个可执行文件。Therefore, the file name does not need to represent an executable file. 它可以是为其扩展已关联与应用程序在系统上安装任何文件类型。It can be of any file type for which the extension has been associated with an application installed on the system. 例如的文件名称可以具有.txt 扩展名，如果你具有使用编辑器 （如记事本） 相关联的文本文件或者如果你已经将提供一个文字处理的工具，如 Microsoft Word 的文本文件，也可能产生.doc。For example the file name can have a .txt extension if you have associated text files with an editor, such as Notepad, or it can have a .doc if you have associated.doc files with a word processing tool, such as Microsoft Word. 同样，在相同的方式`Run`对话框中可以接受使用或不具有.exe 扩展名的可执行文件名、 扩展名为.exe 中是可选`fileName`参数。Similarly, in the same way that the `Run` dialog box can accept an executable file name with or without the .exe extension, the .exe extension is optional in the `fileName` parameter. 例如，你可以设置`fileName`参数以"Notepad.exe"或"记事本"。For example, you can set the `fileName` parameter to either "Notepad.exe" or "Notepad". 此重载不允许进程的命令行自变量。This overload does not allow command-line arguments for the process. 如果你需要指定一个或多个进程的命令行参数，使用或重载。If you need to specify one or more command-line arguments for the process, use the or overloads. 与其他重载的重载不同该操作没有参数不是`static`成员。Unlike the other overloads, the overload of that has no parameters is not a `static` member. 重载时你已创建的使用实例，指定的开始信息 （包括文件名称），并且想要启动一个进程资源并将其与现有实例。Use that overload when you have already created a instance, specified start information (including the file name), and want to start a process resource and associate it with the existing instance. 使用之一`static`重载时你想要创建一个新组件而不是为现有组件启动一个进程。Use one of the `static` overloads when you want to create a new component rather than start a process for an existing component. 此重载和没有参数的重载允许你指定要启动的进程资源的文件名称。Both this overload and the overload that has no parameters allow you to specify the file name of the process resource to start. 如果你有系统中用引号中声明的路径变量，则必须启动任何进程在该位置中找到时，完全限定该路径。If you have a path variable declared in your system using quotes, you must fully qualify that path when starting any process found in that location. 否则，系统将不到的路径。Otherwise, the system will not find the path. 例如，如果`c:\mypath`不在你的路径，并将其使用引号引起来添加： `path = %path%;"c:\mypath"`，必须完全符合中的任何进程`c:\mypath`时启动它。For example, if `c:\mypath` is not in your path, and you add it using quotation marks: `path = %path%;"c:\mypath"`, you must fully qualify any process in `c:\mypath` when starting it. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET Web 页和服务器控件的代码在 Web 服务器上的 ASP.NET 工作进程的上下文中执行。ASP.NET Web page and server control code executes in the context of the ASP.NET worker process on the Web server. 如果你使用在 ASP.NET Web 页或服务器控件中的方法，在具有受限权限的 Web 服务器上执行新进程。If you use the method in an ASP.NET Web page or server control, the new process executes on the Web server with restricted permissions. 进程不与客户端浏览器中，相同的上下文中启动，并且有权访问的用户桌面。The process does not start in the same context as the client browser, and does not have access to the user desktop. 无论何时使用若要启动进程时，你可能需要将其关闭或冒系统资源。Whenever you use to start a process, you might need to close it or you risk losing system resources. 关闭进程使用或。Close processes using or . 你可以检查是否已关闭进程通过其属性。You can check whether a process has already been closed by using its property. 有关托管线程中的单元状态的注意事项此处是必需的。A note about apartment states in managed threads is necessary here. 当是`true`进程组件上属性，请确保已通过将属性设置对应用程序中设置线程模型`[STAThread]`上`main()`方法。When is `true` on the process component's property, make sure you have set a threading model on your application by setting the attribute `[STAThread]` on the `main()` method. 否则，托管的线程可以处于`unknown`状态或将放入`MTA`状态时，发生冲突，而后一个正在`true`。Otherwise, a managed thread can be in an `unknown` state or put in the `MTA` state, the latter of which conflicts with being `true`. 某些方法要求使用的单元状态，不会`unknown`。Some methods require that the apartment state not be `unknown`. 如果未显式设置该状态，那么当应用程序遇到这样的方法时，它默认为`MTA`，而一次设置，就不能更改的单元状态。If the state is not explicitly set, when the application encounters such a method, it defaults to `MTA`, and once set, the apartment state cannot be changed. 但是，`MTA`操作系统外壳程序管理线程时引发异常。However, `MTA` causes an exception to be thrown when the operating system shell is managing the thread. ## Examples 下面的示例首先生成的 Internet Explorer 实例，并在浏览器中显示的收藏夹文件夹的内容。The following example first spawns an instance of Internet Explorer and displays the contents of the Favorites folder in the browser. 然后，启动 Internet Explorer 的一些其他实例，并显示某些特定的页或站点。It then starts some other instances of Internet Explorer and displays some specific pages or sites. 最后，它与时导航到特定站点最小化窗口启动 Internet Explorer。Finally it starts Internet Explorer with the window being minimized while navigating to a specific site. [!code-cpp[Process.Start_static#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CPP/processstartstatic.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process.Start_static#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CS/processstartstatic.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process.Start_static#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/VB/processstartstatic.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载来通过指定其文件名称、 用户名、 密码和域中创建新的进程和其主线程。Use this overload to create a new process and its primary thread by specifying its file name, user name, password, and domain. 然后，新进程指定的凭据 （用户、 域和密码） 的安全上下文中运行指定的可执行文件。The new process then runs the specified executable file in the security context of the specified credentials (user, domain, and password). > [!NOTE] > 在可执行文件位于远程驱动器上，必须通过使用统一资源标识符 (URI)，不链接的驱动器号来标识网络共享。When the executable file is located on a remote drive, you must identify the network share by using a uniform resource identifier (URI), not a linked drive letter. > [!NOTE] > 如果要启动的可执行文件的地址是 URL，则不会启动进程和`null`返回。If the address of the executable file to start is a URL, the process is not started and `null` is returned. 此重载使你无需首先创建一个新启动的进程实例。This overload lets you start a process without first creating a new instance. 该重载是创建一个新的显式步骤的替代方法实例，设置， ， ，和属性属性，再调用为实例。The overload is an alternative to the explicit steps of creating a new instance, setting the , , , and properties of the property, and calling for the instance. 同样，在相同的方式**运行**对话框中可以接受使用或不具有.exe 扩展名的可执行文件名、 扩展名为.exe 中是可选`fileName`参数。Similarly, in the same way that the **Run** dialog box can accept an executable file name with or without the .exe extension, the .exe extension is optional in the `fileName` parameter. 例如，你可以设置`fileName`参数以"Notepad.exe"或"记事本"。For example, you can set the `fileName` parameter to either "Notepad.exe" or "Notepad". 如果`fileName`参数表示一个可执行文件，`arguments`参数可能表示要执行操作，例如文本文件中的文件`Notepad.exe myfile.txt`。If the `fileName` parameter represents an executable file, the `arguments` parameter might represent a file to act upon, such as the text file in `Notepad.exe myfile.txt`. > [!NOTE] > 文件名称必须表示中的可执行文件具有重载`userName`， `password`，和`domain`参数。The file name must represent an executable file in the overloads that have `userName`, `password`, and `domain` parameters. 无论何时使用若要启动进程时，你可能需要将其关闭或冒系统资源。Whenever you use to start a process, you might need to close it or you risk losing system resources. 关闭进程使用或。Close processes using or . 你可以检查是否已关闭进程通过其属性...You can check whether a process has already been closed by using its property.. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用此重载，以启动可执行文件，并演示对引发时尝试启动应用程序与非可执行文件相关联。The following code example shows the use of this overload to start an executable file and also demonstrates the throwing of a when an attempt is made to start an application associated with a nonexecutable file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载来通过指定其文件名、 命令行自变量、 用户名、 密码和域中创建新的进程和其主线程。Use this overload to create a new process and its primary thread by specifying its file name, command-line arguments, user name, password, and domain. 然后，新进程指定的凭据 （用户、 域和密码） 的安全上下文中运行指定的可执行文件。The new process then runs the specified executable file in the security context of the specified credentials (user, domain, and password). > [!NOTE] > 在可执行文件位于远程驱动器上，必须通过使用统一资源标识符 (URI)，不链接的驱动器号来标识网络共享。When the executable file is located on a remote drive, you must identify the network share by using a uniform resource identifier (URI), not a linked drive letter. > [!NOTE] > 如果要启动的可执行文件的地址是 URL，则不会启动进程和`null`返回。If the address of the executable file to start is a URL, the process is not started and `null` is returned. 此重载使你无需首先创建一个新启动的进程实例。This overload lets you start a process without first creating a new instance. 该重载是创建一个新的显式步骤的替代方法实例，设置， ， ， ，和属性属性，再调用为实例。The overload is an alternative to the explicit steps of creating a new instance, setting the , , , , and properties of the property, and calling for the instance. 同样，在相同的方式**运行**对话框中可以接受使用或不具有.exe 扩展名的可执行文件名、 扩展名为.exe 中是可选`fileName`参数。Similarly, in the same way that the **Run** dialog box can accept an executable file name with or without the .exe extension, the .exe extension is optional in the `fileName` parameter. 例如，你可以设置`fileName`参数以"Notepad.exe"或"记事本"。For example, you can set the `fileName` parameter to either "Notepad.exe" or "Notepad". 如果`fileName`参数表示一个可执行文件，`arguments`参数可能表示要执行操作，例如文本文件中的文件`Notepad.exe myfile.txt`。If the `fileName` parameter represents an executable file, the `arguments` parameter might represent a file to act upon, such as the text file in `Notepad.exe myfile.txt`. > [!NOTE] > 文件名称必须表示中的可执行文件具有重载`userName`， `password`，和`domain`参数。The file name must represent an executable file in the overloads that have `userName`, `password`, and `domain` parameters. 无论何时使用若要启动进程时，你可能需要将其关闭或冒系统资源。Whenever you use to start a process, you might need to close it or you risk losing system resources. 关闭进程使用或。Close processes using or . 你可以检查是否已关闭进程通过其属性...You can check whether a process has already been closed by using its property..

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示要用于启动过程的参数集。 represents the set of parameters to use to start a process. 当调用时，用于指定要启动的进程。When is called, the is used to specify the process to start. 仅将必需成员设置是属性。The only necessary member to set is the property. 通过指定启动进程属性是类似于键入中的信息**运行**对话框中的 windows**启动**菜单。Starting a process by specifying the property is similar to typing the information in the **Run** dialog box of the Windows **Start** menu. 因此，属性不需要表示一个可执行文件。Therefore, the property does not need to represent an executable file. 它可以是为其扩展已关联与应用程序在系统上安装任何文件类型。It can be of any file type for which the extension has been associated with an application installed on the system. 例如如果你具有使用编辑器 （如记事本） 相关联的文本文件或者如果你已经将提供一个文字处理的工具，如 Microsoft Word 的文本文件，也可能产生.doc 可以具有.txt 扩展名。For example the can have a .txt extension if you have associated text files with an editor, such as Notepad, or it can have a .doc if you have associated.doc files with a word processing tool, such as Microsoft Word. 同样，在相同的方式**运行**对话框中可以接受使用或不具有.exe 扩展名的可执行文件名、 扩展名为.exe 中是可选成员。Similarly, in the same way that the **Run** dialog box can accept an executable file name with or without the .exe extension, the .exe extension is optional in the member. 例如，你可以设置属性设置为"Notepad.exe"或"记事本"。For example, you can set the property to either "Notepad.exe" or "Notepad". 您可以通过设置启动 ClickOnce 应用程序最初从中安装应用程序的位置 （例如，Web 地址） 的属性。You can start a ClickOnce application by setting the property to the location (for example, a Web address) from which you originally installed the application. 不通过指定其安装的位置在硬盘驱动器上启动 ClickOnce 应用程序。Do not start a ClickOnce application by specifying its installed location on your hard drive. 如果文件名涉及非可执行文件，例如.doc 文件，你可以包括一个谓词指定要对该文件执行的操作。If the file name involves a nonexecutable file, such as a .doc file, you can include a verb specifying what action to take on the file. 例如，你可以设置到以.doc 扩展名的文件的"打印"。For example, you could set the to "Print" for a file ending in the .doc extension. 中指定的文件名称属性不需要具有扩展名，如果你手动输入的值属性。The file name specified in the property does not need to have an extension if you manually enter a value for the property. 但是，如果你使用属性来确定哪些谓词的可用，必须包括扩展名。However, if you use the property to determine what verbs are available, you must include the extension. 你可以更改中指定的参数你调用的时间属性进程上的方法。You can change the parameters specified in the property up to the time that you call the method on the process. 启动过程后，更改值不会影响或重新启动关联的进程。After you start the process, changing the values does not affect or restart the associated process. 如果调用方法替换和属性集，则非托管`CreateProcessWithLogonW`调用函数，以启动该过程在新窗口即使属性值是`true`或属性值是。If you call the method with the and properties set, the unmanaged `CreateProcessWithLogonW` function is called, which starts the process in a new window even if the property value is `true` or the property value is . 如果你未使用方法来启动一个进程，属性不会反映用于启动进程的参数。If you did not use the method to start a process, the property does not reflect the parameters used to start the process. 例如，如果你使用获取的计算机上，运行的进程的数组每个属性不包含的原始文件名或用于启动进程的自变量。For example, if you use to get an array of processes running on the computer, the property of each does not contain the original file name or arguments used to start the process. 当启动进程时，文件名是填充 （只读） 的文件属性。When the process is started, the file name is the file that populates the (read-only) property. 如果你想要检索进程启动后与进程相关联的可执行文件，请使用属性。If you want to retrieve the executable file that is associated with the process after the process has started, use the property. 如果你想要设置的可执行文件实例为其关联的进程尚未启动，请使用属性的成员。If you want to set the executable file of a instance for which an associated process has not been started, use the property's member. 因为的成员属性是自变量传递给方法的过程中，更改属性关联的进程启动后将不会重置属性。Because the members of the property are arguments that are passed to the method of a process, changing the property after the associated process has started will not reset the property. 这些属性仅用于初始化关联的进程。These properties are used only to initialize the associated process. ## Examples 下面的示例填充在其上执行的操作与要执行的文件，和它是否应显示用户界面。The following example populates a with the file to execute, the action performed on it and whether it should displays a user interface. 有关其他示例，请参阅属性参考页类。For additional examples, refer to the reference pages for properties of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是`null`，方法，用于处理事件调用从系统线程池线程上。When is `null`, methods that handle the event are called on a thread from the system thread pool. 有关系统线程池的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about system thread pools, see . 当事件由 visual 的 Windows 窗体组件，如处理，通过系统线程池访问组件可能不起作用，或者可能会导致异常。When the event is handled by a visual Windows Forms component, such as a , accessing the component through the system thread pool might not work, or might result in an exception. 通过设置来避免这到 Windows 窗体组件时，这将导致处理的方法事件在其创建该组件在同一线程上调用。Avoid this by setting to a Windows Forms component, which causes the methods handling the event to be called on the same thread on which the component was created. 如果在内部使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]在 Windows 窗体设计器中，自动设置为包含的控件。If the is used inside [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] in a Windows Forms designer, is automatically set to the control that contains the . 例如，如果你将放置的设计器上`Form1`(其继承自)属性设置为的实例`Form1`:For example, if you place a on a designer for `Form1` (which inherits from ) the property of is set to the instance of `Form1`: [!code-cpp[Process_SynchronizingObject#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_SynchronizingObject/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Process_SynchronizingObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_SynchronizingObject/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Process_SynchronizingObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_SynchronizingObject/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 通常情况下，此属性设置时该组件放置在控件或窗体中，因为这些组件绑定到特定线程。Typically, this property is set when the component is placed inside a control or form, because those components are bound to a specific thread. ## Examples [!code-cpp[Process_SynchronizingObject#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_SynchronizingObject/CPP/process_synchronizingobject.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process_SynchronizingObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_SynchronizingObject/CS/process_synchronizingobject.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process_SynchronizingObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_SynchronizingObject/VB/process_synchronizingobject.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 线程在进程中执行代码。A thread executes code in a process. 每个进程开始使用单线程，其主线程。Each process is started with a single thread, its primary thread. 任何线程可以创建其他线程。Any thread can create additional threads. 在一个进程内的线程都共享进程的地址空间。Threads within a process share the address space of the process. 使用可获取与当前进程关联的所有线程。Use to get all the threads associated with the current process. 主线程不一定是位于索引零数组中。The primary thread is not necessarily at index zero in the array.

span.span: The amount of virtual memory, in bytes, allocated for the associated process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此属性的值表示使用的过程中，以字节为单位的虚拟内存的当前大小。The value returned by this property represents the current size of virtual memory used by the process, in bytes. 操作系统将映射到页加载在物理内存中，或存储在磁盘上的虚拟内存分页文件的页面的每个进程的虚拟地址空间。The operating system maps the virtual address space for each process either to pages loaded in physical memory, or to pages stored in the virtual memory paging file on disk. 此属性可以用于监视与 32 位处理器或 64 位处理器的计算机上的内存使用情况。This property can be used to monitor memory usage on computers with 32-bit processors or 64-bit processors. 属性值等于**虚拟字节**进程的性能计数器。The property value is equivalent to the **Virtual Bytes** performance counter for the process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例启动记事本应用程序的一个实例。The following code example starts an instance of the Notepad application. 该示例然后检索并显示关联的进程的各种属性。The example then retrieves and displays various properties of the associated process. 该示例检测时在进程退出，并显示其退出代码，峰值内存统计信息。The example detects when the process exits, and displays its exit code and peak memory statistics. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WaitForExit() cil managed

summary.span: Instructs the component to wait indefinitely for the associated process to exit.

span.span: Instructs the component to wait indefinitely for the associated process to exit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使当前线程等待，直到在关联的进程终止。 makes the current thread wait until the associated process terminates. 过程调用的所有其他方法后，应调用它。It should be called after all other methods are called on the process. 若要避免妨碍当前线程，请使用 事件。To avoid blocking the current thread, use the event. 此方法指示组件等待无限进程和事件处理程序退出的时间量。This method instructs the component to wait an infinite amount of time for the process and event handlers to exit. 这会导致应用程序停止响应。This can cause an application to stop responding. 例如，如果你调用对于具有用户界面的进程，对操作系统的请求，终止关联的进程可能不会处理如果进程被编写为从来不用输入其消息循环。For example, if you call for a process that has a user interface, the request to the operating system to terminate the associated process might not be handled if the process is written to never enter its message loop. > [!NOTE] > 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]及早期版本、重载会等待毫秒 （大约 24 天），并不是无限期。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] and earlier versions, the overload waited for milliseconds (approximately 24 days), not indefinitely. 此外，以前的版本不会等待事件处理程序，以退出如果完整时间已达到。Also, previous versions did not wait for the event handlers to exit if the full time was reached. 此重载可确保所有处理均已都完成，包括的重定向的标准输出的异步事件处理。This overload ensures that all processing has been completed, including the handling of asynchronous events for redirected standard output. 在调用后，应使用此重载重载时标准输出已被重定向到异步事件处理程序。You should use this overload after a call to the overload when standard output has been redirected to asynchronous event handlers. 当关联的进程退出 （即，当它关闭的情况下通过操作系统通过正常或不正常终止） 时，系统存储过程的管理信息，并返回到调用一样组件。When an associated process exits (that is, when it is shut down by the operation system through a normal or abnormal termination), the system stores administrative information about the process and returns to the component that had called . 组件然后可以访问的信息，其中包括，通过使用已退出进程。The component can then access the information, which includes the , by using the to the exited process. 关联的进程已退出，因为组件属性不再指向现有进程资源。Because the associated process has exited, the property of the component no longer points to an existing process resource. 相反，句柄仅用于访问有关的进程资源的操作系统的信息。Instead, the handle can be used only to access the operating system's information about the process resource. 系统是不通过已发布的已退出进程的句柄感知组件，因此它会保留和之前的内存中的信息组件明确释放这些资源。The system is aware of handles to exited processes that have not been released by components, so it keeps the and information in memory until the component specifically frees the resources. 出于此原因，任何时候您调用为实例时，调用当关联的进程已终止并不再需要有关它的任何管理信息。For this reason, any time you call for a instance, call when the associated process has terminated and you no longer need any administrative information about it. 释放分配给已退出的进程的内存。 frees the memory allocated to the exited process. ## Examples 请参阅备注部分的属性参考页。See the Remarks section of the property reference page.

completed, call the overload that takes no parameter after receiving a `true` from this overload. 为了帮助确保在 Windows 窗体应用程序中正确处理事件，请将设置属性。To help ensure that the event is handled correctly in Windows system is aware of handles to exited processes that have not been released by components, so it keeps the and information in memory until the component specifically frees the resources. summary.span: Causes the component to wait indefinitely for the associated process to enter an idle state.

span.span: Causes the component to wait indefinitely for the associated process to enter an idle state.

summary.span: This overload applies only to processes with a user interface and, therefore, a message loop.

span.span: This overload applies only to processes with a user interface and, therefore, a message loop.

returns.span: if the associated process has reached an idle state.

span.span: if the associated process has reached an idle state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以强制应用程序消息循环已返回到空闲状态等待处理。Use to force the processing of your application to wait until the message loop has returned to the idle state. 用户界面的进程执行时，其消息循环将执行每次操作系统的 Windows 消息发送到进程。When a process with a user interface is executing, its message loop executes every time a Windows message is sent to the process by the operating system. 然后，该进程返回到消息循环。The process then returns to the message loop. 说进程时它正在等待消息的消息循环内处于空闲状态。A process is said to be in an idle state when it is waiting for messages inside of a message loop. 此状态非常有用，例如，当你的应用程序需要等待启动的进程以完成创建其主窗口之前与该窗口的应用程序通信时。This state is useful, for example, when your application needs to wait for a starting process to finish creating its main window before the application communicates with that window. 如果进程不具有消息循环，引发。If a process does not have a message loop, throws an . 重载指示组件无限期地等待进程变为空闲状态消息循环中。The overload instructs the component to wait indefinitely for the process to become idle in the message loop. 此指令可能会导致应用程序停止响应。This instruction can cause an application to stop responding. 例如，如果过程始终写入其消息循环立即退出，如下所示的代码片段`while(true)`。For example, if the process is written to always exit its message loop immediately, as in the code fragment `while(true)`.

summary.span: Gets the associated process's physical memory usage, in bytes.

span.span: Gets the associated process's physical memory usage, in bytes.

value.span: 关联进程当前使用的物理内存总量(以字节为单位)。

span.span: The total amount of physical memory the associated process is using, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此属性的值表示工作集内存使用的过程中，以字节为单位的当前大小。The value returned by this property represents the current size of working set memory used by the process, in bytes. 进程工作集是物理 RAM 内存中的当前可见的进程的内存页的集合。The working set of a process is the set of memory pages currently visible to the process in physical RAM memory. 这些页面为常驻性并且可用于应用程序使用而不会触发页面错误。These pages are resident and available for an application to use without triggering a page fault. 工作集包括共享和私有数据。The working set includes both shared and private data. 共享的数据包括那些包含该进程执行，包括进程模块和系统库的所有说明的页。The shared data includes the pages that contain all the instructions that the process executes, including the process modules and the system libraries. ## Examples 以下示例启动记事本实例。The following example starts an instance of Notepad. 该示例然后检索并显示关联的进程的各种属性。The example then retrieves and displays various properties of the associated process. 该示例检测时在进程退出，并显示进程的退出代码。The example detects when the process exits, and displays the process' exit code. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此属性的值表示工作集内存使用的过程中，以字节为单位的当前大小。The value returned by this property represents the current size of working set memory used by the process, in bytes. 进程工作集是物理 RAM 内存中的当前可见的进程的内存页的集合。The working set of a process is the set of memory pages currently visible to the process in physical RAM memory. 这些页面为常驻性并且可用于应用程序使用而不会触发页面错误。These pages are resident and available for an application to use without triggering a page fault. 工作集包括共享和私有数据。The working set includes both shared and private data. 共享的数据包括那些包含该进程执行，包括进程模块和系统库中的说明的所有说明的页。The shared data includes the pages that contain all the instructions that the process executes, including instructions in the process modules and the system libraries. 此属性可以用于监视与 32 位处理器或 64 位处理器的计算机上的内存使用情况。This property can be used to monitor memory usage on computers with 32-bit processors or 64-bit processors. 属性值等于**工作集大小**进程的性能计数器。The property value is equivalent to the **Working Set** performance counter for the process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例启动记事本应用程序的一个实例。The following code example starts an instance of the Notepad application. 该示例然后检索并显示关联的进程的各种属性。The example then retrieves and displays various properties of the associated process. 该示例检测时在进程退出，并显示其退出代码，峰值内存统计信息。The example detects when the process exits, and displays its exit code and peak memory statistics.
